name: Fat Hunter
description:
Welcome to Fat Hunter - A Text Adventure Game by Shehiro

In an alternate timeline of the 20th Century, obesity has become a global pandemic. You have recently been drafted to the military in a special position known as a "Fat Hunter". Your mission is to annihilate all obesity from your homeland. You are currently a Ryadovoy (Private Second Class), but with good work, promotions are inevitable.

However, knowing that you have a fat wife back at home, you are torn with your decisions. She regularly needs her medicine of dirty burgers, but this puts you at risk with the homeland. If the government finds out that you set any obese people free, you will be executed.
